message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product and I think it's worth every penny.
I understand that you think it's worth every penny, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can you meet me at $105? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to stay within my budget.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'll sell it to you for $112.50
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider one more compromise? I'd be willing to pay $108 for the product. That's the lowest I can go.
I understand that you've made a serious offer, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
